mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification (user_id, type, title, message, target_id, is_read, link_url, read_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{message}, #{targetId}, FALSE, #{linkUrl}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, type, title, message, target_id AS targetId, is_read AS isRead, link_url AS linkUrl, read_at AS readAt, created_at AS createdAt FROM notification WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
